Hi, Zahin here! I'm a [software developer](https://i0.wp.com/tutorial.eyehunts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/img_2_1678630645801.webp?resize=1081%2C990&ssl=1) currently working at [1Password](https://cdn.memes.com/up/40391081663354568/i/1664001647632.png). I am experienced in building [Python](https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/832/930/55d.jpg) and [Golang](https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1656552612011/4tVkG1g4D.png?auto=compress,format&format=webp) based backend web applications, as well as in experimenting with [machine learning](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/1*r8cuSIaM5oHUERP01TCTxg.jpeg) algorithms. Besides coding, I also enjoy playing soccer and solving Rubik's cubes.
